Are you looking for a Staff Engineer position that will have a real impact in the world?

Our client is an established organisation that is transitioning towards becoming the world‚Äôs largest supplier of clean renewable energy. This is a unique opportunity to work on end-to-end projects at scale, from building new infrastructure and services to developing customer-facing web and mobile applications. Your work will literally impact the lives of millions of people!

As a Staff Software Engineer, you will be responsible for designing sophisticated software systems and services, integrating software with other distributed systems and APIs, and leading a team of software engineers. You will be encouraged to stay curious and pick the best technology for a given problem. You will also partner with cross-functional teams across data engineering, data science, product management, and UX design.

Preferred experience:

  • At least 7 years of experience designing and building complex software systems
  • Proficiency with either Python, Java, Scala, Go, C# or similar technologies
  • Experience in system design and awareness of best practices
  • Familiarity with data structures and algorithms
  • Good communication skills

You can apply for the role directly or contact Ionut Roghina on iroghina@trg-uk.com if you have any questions.

Don’t think twice. This is the type of opportunity that rarely comes across!
